name: BEN_LTC_SHARE_OF_COST
description: The BEN_SHARE_OF_COST table contains the long term care share of cost information for the attached benefit record.

columns.name: BENEFIT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the benefits record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: This is the effective start date for a long term care resident's share of cost. The share of cost is the monthly amount a resident must pay as required for certain insurance (Medicaid) to also cover the long term care stay. The share of cost amount is expected to change over time.

columns.name: MONTHLY_AMT
columns.description: This is the monthly patient liable amount for a long term care resident's share of cost. The share of cost is the monthly amount a resident must pay as required for certain insurance (Medicaid) to also cover the long term care stay. The share of cost amount is expected to change over time.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_COMMENT
columns.description: This is a user's comment for this share of cost line.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: When a line in the share of cost table changed, this the person who made the change.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: When a line in the share of cost table changed, this the instant (UTC) when the change was made.
